definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: :Ge 45:23 she-ass (Ar. 0’ata0nun, Aram. [[אַתָּנׇא]], 0otono0, As. atânu)—[[אָתוֹן]] Nu 22:23 + 10 t.; [[אֲתׂנְךָ]] Nu 22:30, Nu 22:32; [[אֲתׂנוֹ]] Ge 49:11 + 2 t.; pl. abs. [[אֲתׂנׁת]] Ge 12:16 + 2 t.; [[אֲתׂנוֹת]] Ju Jdg 5:10 + 12 t.; [[אֲתוֹנוֹת]] Job 1:3, Job 42:12; —she-ass, as dam Ge 49:11, Zec 9:9; as property (constituting wealth) Ge 12:16, Ge 32:16, Job 1:3, Job 1:14, Job 42:12 cf. 1Ch 27:30; so of the asses of Kish 8 t. 1Sa 9:3, 1Sa 9:3, 1Sa 9:5, 1Sa 9:20, 1Sa 10:2, 1Sa 10:2, 1Sa 10:14, 1Sa 10:16; as beasts of burden Ge 45:23; for riding Ju Jdg 5:10, Nu 22:21, Nu 22:22, 2Ki 4:22, 2Ki 4:24; of Balaam's ass 14 t. Nu 22:21, Nu 22:22, Nu 22:23, Nu 22:23, Nu 22:23, Nu 22:25, Nu 22:27, Nu 22:27, Nu 22:28, Nu 22:29, Nu 22:30, Nu 22:30, Nu 22:32, Nu 22:33.
